heaps_greedy.name: Heap - Last Stone Weight
heaps_greedy.description: Given a list of stone weights, repeatedly smash the two heaviest stones until none or one remains. Return the final remaining weight.

heaps_greedy.name: Greedy - Merge Intervals
heaps_greedy.description: Given a list of intervals, merge all overlapping intervals and return the result in sorted order based on start times.

heaps_greedy.name: Greedy - Non-Overlapping Intervals
heaps_greedy.description: Given a list of intervals, compute the minimum number of intervals that must be removed to eliminate all overlaps using a greedy end-time selection strategy.

heaps_greedy.name: Greedy - Meeting Rooms Required
heaps_greedy.description: Given meeting time intervals, return the minimum number of conference rooms required, using separate start and end time sorting.

heaps_greedy.name: Heap - Priority Scheduling
heaps_greedy.description: Given tasks with processing times, schedule them using a min-heap so that shorter tasks execute first. Return the total time or resulting order as needed.
